IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO INSPIRE CITIZEN PARTICIPATION, TO ELEVATE GOVERNMENT PERFORMANCE THROUGH LEADERSHIP TRAINING FOR PUBLIC SERVICE, AND TO PROVIDE NON-PARTISAN ANALYSIS AND ASSIST IN PROVIDING SOLUTIONS FOR PUBLIC POLICY ISSUES IMPORTANT TO THE REGION, STATE AND NATION.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO INSPIRE CITIZEN PARTICIPATION, TO ELEVATE GOVERNMENT PERFORMANCE THROUGH LEADERSHIP TRAINING FOR PUBLIC SERVICE, AND TO PROVIDE NON-PARTISAN ANALYSIS AND ASSIST IN PROVIDING SOLUTIONS FOR PUBLIC POLICY ISSUES IMPORTANT TO THE REGION, STATE AND NATION.
IRS990.Desc: CONDUCTED THE FOLLOWING PROGRAMS TO INSPIRE CITIZEN PARTICIPATION, ELEVATE GOVERNMENT PERFORMANCE THROUGH LEADERSHIP TRAINING FOR PUBLIC SERVICE AND PROVIDE NON-PARTISAN ANALYSIS FOR PUBLIC POLICY ISSUES:* CITIZEN PARTICIPATION* GOVERNMENT LEADERSHIP: SCHOLARSHIPS-INTERNSHIPS, NONPARTISAN TRAINING CENTER, POLICY ANALYSIS, RECOGNITION OF OUTSTANDING PUBLIC OFFICIALS.* PUBLIC POLICY ISSUES: HIGHER EDUCATION IN CALIFORNIA, URBAN PLANNING, HEALTH CARE, HIGH SPEED RAIL-TRANSPORTATION, FRACKING-ENERGY & ENVIRONMENT, CALIFORNIA'S LEGISLATURE: LEGISLATION AND ETHICS, CALIFORNIA'S CRIMINAL JUSTICE SYSTEM, CALIFORNIA'S PUBLIC EMPLOYEE PENSIONS, CALIFORNIA'S POLITICAL PARTIES, CALIFORNIA'S BUSINESS CLIMATE, CALIFORNIA'S WATER, K-12 EDUCATION IN CALIFORNIA, CALIFORNIA'S INITIATIVE PROCESS, CALIFORNIA'S SAFETY NET PROGRAMS-SOCIAL WELFARE, CALIFORNIA'S POLITICAL CLIMATE, CALIFORNIA'S STATE BUDGET.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part IV, Line 2b: Explanation of escrow account liability
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE CUSTODIAL ACCOUNT LIABILITY REPRESENTS THE "WONDERFUL PUBLIC SERVICE FELLOWSHIPX AND "COS SCHOLARSHIP" FUNDS THAT ARE HELD AND ADMINISTERED BY THE KENNETH L. MADDY INSTITUTE. THE FUNDS ARE EARMARKED TO HELP SAN JOAQUIN VALLEY STUDENTS OBTAIN THEIR GRADUATE DEGREE FROM TOP GRADUATE PROGRAMS AND RETURN HOME TO APPLY WHAT THEY HAVE LEARNED TO MAKE THE VALLEY A BETTER PLACE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Part V, Line 4: Intended uses of the endowment fund.
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE ANNUAL INCOME FROM ENDOWMENT FUNDS IS USED AS GENERAL OPERATING REVENUE TO SUPPORT THE ORGANIZATION'S MISSION.

Scholarships are awarded for the Legislative Internship Program. The Legislative Internship Program provides students with opportunities to develop public leadership skills while gaining practical knowledge of the day-to-day operations of government and the political process. Students are selected based on their academic standing to elevate citizen participation and government performance at all levels through leadership training for public service.Each student must complete a daily hours log, sign a code of conduct, attend the internship orientation, complete learning objectives at the start of the internship, complete a final report, complete an evaluation of the experience, and have the legislative office fill out an evaluation of the student's performance.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE TREASURER, ON BEHALF OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, REVIEWS A DRAFT VERSION OF FORM 990 PRIOR TO FILING.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: STAFF AND MEMBERS OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAVE A DUTY TO DISCLOSE ACTUAL AND POTENTIAL CONFLICTS OF INTEREST AND ALL MATERIAL FACTS RELATED THERETO, TO THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS, AND SHALL DISCLOSE AT LEAST ANNUALLY IN WRITING ANY INTEREST THAT COULD GIVE RISE TO A POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: EXECUTIVE DIRECTOR'S COMPENSATION IS DECIDED BY THE PRESIDENT OF THE UNIVERSITY IN CONJUNCTION WITH THE CHAIRMAN OF THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST - COPIES ARE MAINTAINED ONSITE.

IdRelatedTaxExemptOrgGrp.PrimaryActivitiesTxt: ADMINISTER FUNDS/PROPERTY FOR THE BENEFIT OF CSU FRESNO.
